about_the_game:
AstroCam is a camera application for daily observing and taking pictures of the night sky.
Just by connecting your PlayerOne™︎ astro camera to your computer with USB cable, you can watch live preview images without much hustle.
Once connected, you can adjust various parameters provided by camera on the fly for better images.
It is not just for live previewing but also capturing raw images from camera.
Most of operations can be done not only by mouse but also keyboard/gamepad.

Supported cameras
- PlayerOne™︎ Cooled/Planetary cameras (STARVIS/STARVIS2 recommended)

Features
- Real-time preview of debayered raw images from camera
- Live histogram
- Preview image adjustment (Low-threshold/Gamma)
- Horizontal/Vertical flip in preview
- Camera parameter adjustment including TEC cooling
- Capture images in DNG format containing unmodified RAW8/RAW16 data from camera
- Capture debayered JPG alongside with DNG for convenience
- Keyboard/Gamepad control support (including SteamDeck)
- Multiple camera selection from menu
- Automatically save/restore camera configurations

NOTE: DNG file can be opened with RawTherapee

  • Processor: Core i5 8th gen
